hint.text: Add the number of students falling in the two categories below \(20\) marks.

solution.text:
The students require a minimum of \(20\) marks to pass.
The number of students who have scored between \(0\) and \(10\) are \(7\) and the number of students who have scored between \(10\) and \(20\) are \(5\).
Therefore, number of students who have failed the Math Test are :
\(7+5=12\)

content.text: How many students have failed the Math Test considering that they require a minimum of \(20\) marks to pass?
